content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the music before the refrain?

choices.label: It comprises verses that are exactly the same in both music and text.
It comprises verses that are exactly the same in music but differ in text.
It comprises verses that are exactly the same in text but differ in music.
It comprises verses that differ in both text and music.

skill.text: Skill 2.F: Use terms and symbols to describe formal features and relationships in notated music, including motives, phrases, and phrase relationships.
